New Records: Mohammad Rizwan scored his highest ODI score of 131*
Pakistan opener Abdullah Shafique scored his first hundred in an ODI
Key Match Events: Kusal Mendis scored 122 off 77 balls for Sri Lanka
Shafique and Rizwan put on 176 for the third wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Rizwan expressed pride in the team's performance
Rizwan mentioned the team's positive vibes during the chase
Rizwan joked about his cramp during the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rizwan was aided by Dasun Shanaka due to cramp during the match
Others: Pakistan is in a strong early position in the tournament with two wins from two
Pakistan's next match is against India in Ahmedabad
